programme.title: FIM Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα Μοτοσυκλέτας Γυναικών 2024
programme.desc: To Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα Μοτοσυκλέτας Γυναικών FIM είναι μια σειρά αγώνων μόνο για γυναίκες και περιλαμβάνει έξι γύρους και ένα τεστ προετοιμασίας, όλα ενσωματωμένα στο Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα Superbike. Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Διατσίδης.

programme.title: Motorsports: Extreme-E 2024
programme.desc: Η ηλεκτρική οδήγηση φτάνει σε μερικές από τις πιο απομονωμένες γωνιές του πλανήτη για να τονίσει τις συνέπειες της κλιματικής αλλαγής που αντιμετωπίζουν τα διαφορετικά οικοσυστήματα, ενώ συνάμα παρουσιάζει την απόδοση ηλεκτρικών SUV σε ακραίες συνθήκες. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Κυριαζής.

programme.title: DTM 2024
programme.desc: Το Γερμανικό Πρωτάθλημα Τουρισμού φιλοξενεί τροποποιημένα αυτοκίνητα που κυκλοφορούν στον δρόμο, αποτελείται από 16 αγώνες σε 8 αγωνιστικά διήμερα. Η διοργάνωση έχει ως βάση της τη Γερμανία, με γύρους να διεξάγονται και σε άλλα μέρη της Ευρώπης. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: ERC 2024
programme.desc: Με χρονιά εκκίνησης το 1953, το Ευρωπαϊκό Πρωτάθλημα Ράλι της FIA γίνεται 70 ετών το 2023 με ένα πρόγραμμα 8 γύρων που διεξάγεται σε άσφαλτο και χαλίκι. Πρόκειται για το απόλυτο πεδίο προπόνησης για τα νέα ταλέντα που στοχεύουν στην κορυφή του αθλήματος. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Μάριος Παπαδόπουλος.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: Live: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Previously thought to be extinct, a massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific. With time running out, a visionary oceanographer recruits rescue diver Jonas Taylor to save the crew and the sea itself from an unimaginable threat -- a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the Megalodon.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: In Steven Spielberg's massive blockbuster, paleontologists Alan Grant (Sam Neill) and Ellie Sattler (Laura Dern) and mathematician Ian Malcolm (Jeff Goldblum) are among a select group chosen to tour an island theme park populated by dinosaurs created from prehistoric DNA. While the park's mastermind, billionaire John Hammond (Richard Attenborough), assures everyone that the facility is safe, they find out otherwise when various ferocious predators break free and go on the hunt.

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: On an island research facility, Dr. Susan McAlester (Saffron Burrows) is harvesting the brain tissue of DNA-altered sharks as a possible cure for Alzheimer's disease. When the facility's backers send an executive (Samuel L. Jackson) to investigate the experiments, a routine procedure goes awry and a shark starts attacking the researchers. Now, with sharks outnumbering their human captors, McAlester and her team must figure out a way to stop them from escaping to the ocean and breeding.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team places Mateo Diaz, a high school gang member turned informant, in protective custody while they investigate the murder of his junior reserve officers' training corps instructor; Pride needs his brother's help to gain Mateo's trust.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Navy contractor who secretly lived two lives for decades.

programme.desc: Pride is given a series of tasks to complete by unknown assailants who are holding Wade and his father hostage.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Prue is sucked into another dimension, finding herself trapped inside a painting with a dangerous warlock; Phoebe tries to get funds for Piper's nightclub.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: At the summer camp where her mother drowned, Prue must follow in her mother's footsteps to protect the returning campers from a watery demon.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters are targeted by a hit woman known as Ms. Hellfire, and Prue goes under cover to find out who hired her, flirting with a cold-blooded criminal.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Prue and Phoebe break a code of conduct to cure Piper when she is hospitalized with a deadly disease, but the illness is spread to other patients.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After Prue rescues an unlucky woman who is being tormented by a Darklighter, she is beset by telepathic messages telling her to commit suicide.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A demon emancipates celluloid monsters from the confines of the silver screen to kill Phoebe, Piper and Prue.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Christian Wolff (Ben Affleck) is a mathematics savant with more affinity for numbers than people. Using a small-town CPA office as a cover, he makes his living as a freelance accountant for dangerous criminal organizations. With a Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) hot on his heels, Christian takes on a state-of-the-art robotics company as a legitimate client. As Wolff gets closer to the truth about a discrepancy that involves millions of dollars, the body count starts to rise.

programme.title: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: The team of top-secret program brings ATF agent Doug Carlin (Denzel Washington) into its midst to capture the terrorist (Jim Caviezel) responsible for a ferry bombing that left hundreds dead. Its amazing technology lets the team fold time four days backward and see the madman's movements as he plots to kill a woman who could give him away. Doug realizes that the technology could allow him to do what law-enforcement officers dream of -- go back in time to prevent the crime.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Miami-Dade detectives Mike Lowrey (Will Smith) and Marcus Burnett (Martin Lawrence) blow a fuse when $100 million worth of heroin they recently confiscated is heisted from station headquarters. Suspecting it was an inside job, Internal Affairs gives them five days to track down the drugs before they shut down the narcotics division. Action meets farce when Marcus is compelled to masquerade as his partner in order to gain the trust of a call girl (Tea Leoni), a key witness in their investigation.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: The drug ecstasy is flowing into Miami, and the police want it stopped. Police Detective Marcus Burnett (Martin Lawrence) and his partner, Mike Lowrey (Will Smith), are just the men to do it. They track the drugs to a Cuban smuggler, Johnny Tapia (Jordi Mollà), who is also involved in a bloody war with Russian and Haitian mobsters. If that isn't bad enough, there's tension between the two cops because Lowrey is romantically involved with Burnett's sister, Syd (Gabrielle Union).

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug (Justin Bartha) and three friends (Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis) drive to Las Vegas for a wild and memorable stag party. In fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they can't remember a thing; nor can they find Doug. With little time to spare, the three hazy pals try to re-trace their steps and find Doug so they can get him back to Los Angeles in time to walk down the aisle.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Two years after the disastrous events in Las Vegas, it is now Stu's (Ed Helms) turn to walk down the aisle. Since his bride is from Thailand, Stu decides to hold the wedding there. Desperately hoping to avoid the mayhem of Doug's (Justin Bartha) bachelor party, Stu chooses what he thinks will be a safe option: an alcohol-free, prewedding brunch. But this being Thailand, and with Phil (Bradley Cooper) and Alan (Zach Galifianakis) again in attendance, anything can happen.

programme.desc: Evropsko prvenstvo u košarci za U20 reprezentacije održava se od 1992. godine. Do 2005. se održavalo svake druge, dok se sada održava svake godine.

programme.title: Košarka (Ž) U17 SP (Mexico): 1/2 Finale A
programme.desc: Svetsko prvenstvo za ženske košarkaške reprezentacije u kategoriji do sedamnaest godina održava se od 9. do 17. jula 2022. godine u Mađarskoj. (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal - Norveška liga: Tromso - KFUM
programme.desc: Prva liga Norveške je najviše fudbalsko ligaško takmičenje u Norveškoj.

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (M): Argentina - Germany
programme.desc: Pogledajte međunarodne susrete muških odbojkaških reprezentacija koje su članice Međunarodne odbojkaške federacije (FVIB). Takmičenje se odvija u dve faze dok se četiri ekipe ne plasiraju u...

programme.title: Bundesliga 2023/24: Hoffenheim - Werder
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: Saudijska liga 2023/2024: Shabab - Nassr
programme.desc: Pratite Saudijsku profesionalnu ligu, najvišu fudbalsku ligu u ligaškom sistemu Saudijske Arabije. Osnovana je 1976. godine kao prva profesionalna fudbalska liga Kraljevine Saudijske Arabije.

programme.title: Atletika: Dijamantska liga - Monaco
programme.desc: Meeting Herculis je međunarodno atletsko takmičenje koje je deo serije Dijamantske lige. Takmičenje se održava jednom godišnje, u julu, na stadionu Stade Louis II u Monaku od 1987. godine.

programme.title: Fudbal - Prijateljska utakmica: Ajax - Olympiacos
programme.desc: Nema više prijateljskih utakmica. Svi se bore za mesto u timu, svi se bore da podignu svoju cenu na fudbalskom tržištu. (LIVE).

programme.title: Jedrenje - Sail GP: San Francisco - 1. dan
programme.desc: SailGP je međunarodno jedriličarsko takmičenje katamaranima tipa F50 koje je započelo 2019. godine.

programme.title: Bugarska liga - start sezone: Cherno More - CSKA 1948
programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona. (LIVE).

programme.title: Legende Evrolige: Bob Mors + Bogdan Tanjević + Božidar Maljković
programme.desc: Predstavljamo vam legende najjačeg i najvažnijeg klupskog profesionalnog košarkaškog takmičenja u Evropi.

programme.title: Na današnji dan
programme.desc: Podsećanje na godišnjice uspeha sportista, klubova i reprezentacije koji su se dogodili na današnji dan.

programme.title: Slovenačka 1. liga - start sezone: Olimpija - Primorje
programme.desc: Prethodnih sezona gledali smo veoma zanimljiva prvenstva u Sloveniji i dobijali iznenađujuće ishode. Da li će tako biti i ove sezone? (LIVE).

programme.title: F1 Hungaroring: Trening 1
programme.desc: Velika nagrada Mađarske je sastavni deo Svetskog prvenstva u Formuli 1. Ovo je takmičenje koje se svake godine održava na Hungaroringu, koji se nalazi u blizini Budimpešte.

programme.title: F1 Hungaroring: Trening 2
programme.desc: Velika nagrada Mađarske je sastavni deo Svetskog prvenstva u Formuli 1. Ovo je takmičenje koje se svake godine održava na Hungaroringu, koji se nalazi u blizini Budimpešte.

programme.title: E-Sports: League of Legends - EBL
programme.desc: Novi igrači, nove ekipe, sve je spremno za novi split EBL-a! Najbolji balkanski igrači takmiče se, ne samo za trofej, već i za mesto na prestižnom evropskom takmičenju: EMEA Masters.

programme.title: F3 Hungaroring: Kvalifikacije
programme.desc: Pred letnju pauzu, veoma je važno skupiti što više poena. Ali, ipak je glavni posao ovih momaka da se nametnu skautima F1 timova.

programme.title: F2 Hungaroring: Kvalifikacije
programme.desc: Formula 2 nosi službeni naziv FIA Formula Two Championship, a ove automobilske trke održavaju se u organizaciji Međunarodne automobilske federacije. Pratite trke Formule 2 Grand Prix Mađarske!

programme.desc: Pogledajte međunarodne susrete muških odbojkaških reprezentacija koje su članice Međunarodne odbojkaške federacije (FVIB). Takmičenje se odvija u dve faze dok se četiri ekipe ne plasiraju u...

programme.title: Košarka (Ž) U20 EP (Lithuania): Finale: France - Spain
programme.desc: Od 2000. godine najbolje mlade evropske košarkašice takmiče se na Evropskom prvenstvu do 20 godina. Divizija A je najviši stepen U-20 prvenstva u organizaciji FIBA Evrope.

programme.title: Atletika: Dijamantska liga - London
programme.desc: Pratite najnovije izdanje Dijamantske lige na mitingu u Londonu. (LIVE).

programme.title: Trans World Sport
programme.desc: Interesantne priče i neobični sportovi iz svih delova sveta. Uvek ćete biti u toku uz ovu emisiju.

programme.title: Švajcarska liga - start sezone: Lugano - Grasshopper
programme.desc: Švajcarska Super liga pod tim nazivom se vodi od 2003. godine, dok je prvi prvak okrunjen davne 1898. Prvi prvak i najuspješniji klub sa čak 27 titule je Grasshopper Club Zürich. (LIVE).

programme.title: Profi boks (Birmingham): Magnificent 7
programme.desc: Roki Marčano, Majk Tajson, Šugar Rej Robinson, Muhamed Ali, Džo Luis. Treba li još koji razlog više da bi pratili ovu plemenitu borilačku veštinu? Prve tragove boksa nalazimo već u trećem veku pre... (LIVE).

programme.title: F1 Hungaroring: Kvalifikacije
programme.desc: Velika nagrada Mađarske je sastavni deo Svetskog prvenstva u Formuli 1. Ovo je takmičenje koje se svake godine održava na Hungaroringu, koji se nalazi u blizini Budimpešte.

programme.title: Porsche Supercup: Hungaroring: Kvalifikacije
programme.desc: Porsche Supercup je međunarodna automobilska trka koja je pokrenuta 1993. godine pod pokroviteljstvom FIE. Šest ekipa i 24 vozača svake godine se takmiči za pobednički pokal. Svi vozači su za volanom...

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...
